thread.section_title: DogVacay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DogVacay | dogvacay.com
thread.title: Nick Minniti

author: Nick Minniti
title: Nick Minniti
text: This is a great service for dog owners that do not wish to place their family member in a kennel environment. There are reviews of sitters, what their preferences are (i.e weight, allowed on couch ,walk schedules). It cost me roughly half of what I would have paid at the kennel and I know my dog had a better time in a quiet/ chill environment at my sitter's place. I will definitely be using this service again and now have peace of mind to be able to book a vacation without having to worry about my dog struggle in a kennel.
